title: I’m So Jealous!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>You’re so lucky, Nicocchi. I’m so jealous of your name<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What are you on about, well, Nico gets why you would want to be jealous of me, but for my name? Really? There are other things too, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s gotta for your name!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Why!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You see~, “Nico nico no Nicocchi” is just the best pun, and it’s even catchy on top of that, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Don’t just turn my name into a pun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That’s not the end, though.... The possibilities are endless.... You can do something like, “Nikogori ni ko motta nico nico no nicocchi, koko ni kourin”!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Isn’t that more of a tongue twister than a pun....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh....? Ahaha, that’s true~! Ahahaha, you’re the best, Nicocchi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I know that’s supposed to be a compliment.... But it somehow feels wrong....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
